H0.text: Capnolagia is the arousal from watching others do what. Fire

H1.text: Capnolagia is the arousal from watching others do what. Dance

H2.text: Capnolagia is the arousal from watching others do what. Cooking

H3.text: Capnolagia is the arousal from watching others do what. Smoke

A4.text: sexual arousal from the observation or imagination of a person smoking, sometimes including oneself.

A5.text: It is a sexual fetish based on the pulmonary consumption (smoking) of tobacco, most often via cigarettes, cigars, cannabis and also pipes, vapes, and hookahs to some extent.
